descriptionHtml:
Located west of falkreath (check pictures for map) Fast Travel Enabled 

(This mod is now much bigger than the review video)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FXyWpkhUozU

Welcome to the Druids Den Final version this unique living space is one of my best 
and has alot to offer,after some updates it is now at a great looking and playable 
stage to make it your main living space.There are lots of features to this mod with 
it being made really for a mage type char but can be used with others,i have put a lot 
of hard work into this to give you a very different and unique player home with a very 
different class type theme in mind,please check the features of this mod and enjoy. 

PLEASE CHECK ALL THE PICTURES FOR DETAILS 
******************************************************************* 

Living area layout 
********************** 
Beautiful surroundings with a woodland feel to the place and at night it is very 
atmospheric and enchanting,the glow of the whole area enforces the druid feel 
to the mod and fits in perfectly. 

Druids Enchanter 
********************** 
This makes druid potions of various types including poisons,cloaks of fire,frost 
and a few others that come in handy,some are really powerful and some are 
powerful spells in potion form.They all have ingredients to collect and find in 
order to to create the potion of your choice,use the vendor for those ingredients 
you dont have or can\'t find he sells all what you need for the enchanter. 

Features 
************ 
Crafting tables and a unique Druids Enchanter table to make druid potions 
Living space with bed,wardrobe and dresser 
Storage chest (Enchanted alchemy robes,jewellry and a Dagger) 
strong box of ingredients &amp; leveled items (No respawn) 
Storage barrel (Leveled items) 

Plant Garden 
***************** 
Full of ingredients for alchemy,Spells and dagger next to garden steps on the 
rocks also extra storage chest with staff,spell and robes through the garden. 

Vendor 
********* 
Wood Elf Sells ingredients and potions (Can be found near living space steps) 

Crafting areas 
************** 
Smithing area and Cooking spit (Look for steps behind the Main living space) 
Smithing barrel and Supplies 
Food Barrel 
Arrow Barrel 

Storage 
********** 
(All chests,barrels and strongbox\'s No Respawn) 
Extra Storage area (Chests,barrels and strongbox\'s) 
Extra stroage chest (No respawn) in garden 

Spells 
-------- 
Druid destruction spells 
****************************** 
Druid Masters spell 
Druid Frost Sprigg Spell 
Druid Flame Sprigg Spell 
------------------------- 
(Druid animal spirit spell pack) 
Conjure Spirit Spider 
Conjure Spirit King Spider 
Conjure Spirit Chaurus 
Conjure Spirit Sabre Cat 
Conjure Spirit Troll 
Conjure Spriggan 
Conjure Druid King Spriggan 
Conjure spirit forsworn hero 
Night Eye Spell 

Robes and Weapons 
--------------------------- 
Druid Masters Robes (Archamge robes) 
Druid Robes and Druid fine robes 100% - 150% Magicka Regen. 
Druid robes resist fire 50% 
Druid robes resist frost 50% 
Druid Master staff (Paralyze) 
Druid Staff of shouts 
Druid Sword (Enchanted) 
Druid Mace (Enchanted) 
Druid Bow (Enchanted) 
Druid Boots (Enchanted) 
Druid robes of poison 
Druid robes of resist shock 

DLC 
++++ 
Does not require any dlc to run 

Credits 
++++++ 
As reviewd by WhackoMacko WhackoMacko 
Subscribe to his channel for the latest best mod reviews. 

Final note 
************* 
I hope you enjoy this mod as i do using it any possible updates 
in the future will not be for a while and would have to be useful 
to the mod itself,please rate and check my other mods,thank you.
author: EvilMrPumpkinsNexus
